title: Cant update client, keep getting unspecified error
body:
Yesterday I was playing a game when i got bugsplat. So i tried to fix it in the client by repairing but halfway through it came up with "unspecified error, see logs for information" something along those lines. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the game and it is still not working. I've tried deleting certain things but its still not working either. This is what im seeing everytime I try to patch the client. It keeps showing my internet speed Mb(KBps) but doesnt actually tell me how long to go and how many files need to be scanned.
http://imgur.com/a/j6Ylh

replies.body:
Hey there,

* Could you please download and install the [HRT (Hextech Repair Tool)](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi).
* Select 'Gather System & LoL Logs'.
* Locate the LoL Logs.zip generated to your desktop and upload to a host of your choice, reply back with a link to the file.

**Dxdiag**
	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhP/dxdiag.txt
**Network info**
	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhQ/network_info_log.txt
**Ping**
	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhR/ping.txt
**Proc_List**
	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhS/proc_list.txt
**Rads user kernel
**	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhT/rads_user_kernel.log
**Task log**
	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhU/task_log.txt
**LoL Patcher Logs**
	http://www.megafileupload.com/bxhW/2016-08-14T10-44-42_LoLPatcher.log

**Launcher Logs**

Could you please upload the .zip file generated by HRT, not just the contents of it as this makes it much harder for me to look through your logs.
I dont know how to upload the .zip file onto a host. Could you please tell me how to?
The same way you uploaded all those other files. I personally use mega.co.nz
